overview:
Jonas Thornholm is Vice President US and CFO.

As Vice President US and CFO, Jonas works as a business partner with the CEO and is closely involved in overseeing strategy, operations, and performance.

He has responsibility for enhancing Xcerions technology offerings by identifying and securing opportunities with strategic business partners. He has previously worked as CFO of ALC Legal Technologies, Senior Controller for Jones Lang Lasalle, Stockholm and Controller for the investment Group Stellar International Holdings in Seattle.

In 1999, Mr Thornholm founded NordicDomains together with Michael Heijer. NordicDomains invests in technology and cancer research. Jonas started his career as an auditor with PriceWaterhouseCoopers. He is experienced in strategic planning, financial and competitive market analysis and holds a MBA
